Html:
Hi Kirill,

is it possible to rotate something like a selected polygon or other shapes or selected figures?

If not jet possible, how can I implement something like this?

Regards,

Michael

Hi Michael,

it's not yet possible and it will require some thinking. Ideally it would be great to take a look at existing programs to see how they do it. There usually is one green "anchor" point for every selected figure and everything rotates around this figure.

I can't promise implementing it in the near future since I'm very busy these days. However if you'd want to implement it yourself, I'd start with a new behavior based on Dragger (possible called RotationBehavior?)

Maybe in a couple of months I'll get to it...

Thanks,

Kirill
